name: Before I Go
description:
Made for GMTKJam 2020.

Describing the game would probably ruin it, so just explore what you can and keep in mind: it's probably not a bug. Link to walkthrough below.

Credits:
Rig and idle animation from Mixamo
Toon shader by Roystan
All other art and code was made by us.

Walkthrough in case you're really stuck:
https://pastebin.com/raw/76yXbctT
